comments.author: Mometaskers
comments.body: If you think about it, you can consider UBI the equivalent of "bread and circus," just give them enough to survive and not cause trouble. But then again if "they" (whoever they are) can just produce anything they want, there's really no use to keeping people around. I personally haven't made up my mind about UBI.As for coof passports, we already had that. You can't travel to some countries without a vaxx certificate. Some countries also restricted the unvaxxed's use of public transport.
